scripts.dev: node src/utils/processThumbnails.mjs && node scripts/prepareData.mjs && astro dev
scripts.start: node src/utils/processThumbnails.mjs && node scripts/prepareData.mjs && astro dev
scripts.build: node src/utils/processThumbnails.mjs && node scripts/prepareData.mjs && astro build && node ./scripts/notify-indexnow.js
